subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: No. 8 Pittsburgh had to withstand a furious fourth-quarter Notre Dame rally to win at home, 27-22, an outcome that might raise cries for the ouster of Fighting Irish Coach Charlie Weis.
snippet: No. 8 Pittsburgh had to withstand a furious fourth-quarter Notre Dame rally to win at home, 27-22, an outcome that might raise cries for the ouster of Fighting Irish Coach Charlie Weis.
